items.sentence: Tom and Mary said they hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tell Tom which bus he should take to get to the station.
Try to stay a bit more alert to what goes on around you.
Tom told me that I\'m faster at doing that than Mary is.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t do that unless you did it with him.
I think I\'ll be able to do that today before I go home.
I think it\'s unlikely Tom will come to the party alone.
You should probably tell Tom you won\'t do that anymore.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t want to come to Boston with us.
Tom regretted getting that tattoo, so he had it removed.
Tom reminds me of someone I used to know in high school.
Tom said he needed the rest of the money that I owe him.
Everyone in the city appears to be constantly on the go.
Tom is the one who told me that I should read this book.
Tom is the only man in the world that can pull this off.
Normally we have to wait for only three or four minutes.
On this matter, I feel exactly the same as way Tom does.
Tom and Mary spread their sleeping bags inside the tent.
I don\'t think that Tom knows where Mary learned French.
I don\'t watch TV as much as I used to when I was a kid.
I don\'t think we can move this piano without some help.
The police approached the suspect with their guns drawn.
Let\'s not eat mashed potatoes for dinner again tonight.
I don\'t think Tom knows when Mary got back from Boston.
We\'re enjoying another beautiful day here on the beach.
We\'re going to the beach. Would you like to go with us?
We\'re pretty happy with the way things have turned out.
We\'re trying to teach Tom basic problem-solving skills.
I\'m fairly certain that Tom doesn\'t have any siblings.
I come into contact with all kinds of people in my work.
There is something important I want to discuss with you.
Tom and Mary aren\'t the only two who don\'t understand.
That day, Tom bought as many cameras as he could afford.
If I\'d known Tom\'s phone number, I\'d have called him.
Tom and Mary worked in the same company for three years.
There\'s a man that I don\'t know in front of the house.
I almost did what you\'re accusing me of, but I didn\'t.
Tom knows what to do when Mary has an epileptic seizure.
Tom offered Mary some money, but she refused to take it.
This would taste better if you added a little more salt.
Can you see the woman standing behind Tom? That\'s Mary.
I can\'t believe you\'re going to ask Mary to marry you.
I can\'t blame Tom for something that was Mary\'s fault.
Tom waited for hours just to see Mary for a few minutes.
Tom walked up to one of the houses and knocked the door.
Tom was escorted out of the building by security guards.
Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t understand French.
Tom isn\'t the type of person who does things like that.
I thought that you said that you were scared to do that.
I don\'t want to say anything that might make Tom angry.
